data.title: Best Radio Diagnosis Doctor in Bangalore
data.meta_description: Dr. Suman T.P is a consultant radiologist with expertise in Fetal Medicine, Cardiac Imaging, Neuroradiology, and Musculoskeletal Radiology.
data.text:
Dr. Suman is a consultant radiologist working at M S Ramaiah Hospital with over 4 years of experience. He has vast experience in the field of radiology with expertise in Fetal Medicine, Cardiac Imaging, Neuroradiology, and Musculoskeletal Radiology. He has completed his residency at JSS University and pursued EdiR accredited by the European Board of Radiology. He is fellowship-trained in MRI and Cardiac imaging and Fetal Medicine. He has various publications and presentations at various national and international conferences. Dr. Suman is light hearted person who is easily approachable with good communication skills and at the same time competent and dedicated towards quality patient care.

Certificate of Merit award, RSNA 2019

Life member in Indian Radiological & Imaging Association and Indian Medical Association.

Corresponding member in Radiological Society of North America and European Society of Radiology
